alert.note: Alert for Atoka (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 09 at 2:13PM CDT until June 10 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Clear Boggy Creek near Caney affecting Atoka County.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC005-100715- /O.EXT.KOUN.FL.W.0012.000000T0000Z-220610T0900Z/ /CANO2.1.ER.220609T1300Z.220609T1830Z.220610T0300Z.NO/ 213 PM CDT Thu Jun 9 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clear Boggy Creek near Caney. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Creek levels rise to slightly above bankfull stages in western Atoka County and the northeastern edge of Bryan County. High stages on small feeder streams result in even greater depths to mainstem bottomlands near their points of entry into Clear Boggy Creek. Only croplands... pastures... and some secondary rural roads are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 26.5 feet. - Forecast...The Clear Boggy Creek is near crest and expected to fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
